Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to view property value expanded inline in the new cloud flow designer in Power Automate. This feature will reach general availability on February 10, 2026.

How does this affect me?
This feature enables you to use the inline view to examine property values from multiple steps at once when authoring or debugging flows.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit View property value expanded inline in the new cloud flow designer.

Title: Power Automate - View property value expanded inline in the new cloud flow designer
